frame.name: Luck
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is evaluated as good (or bad), against a background assumption that previously, the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> was thought to be unlikely to occur. The <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> holds for a particular <fen>Protagonist</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">He</fex> is a <t>lucky</t> <fex name="Role">gambler</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: State_of_affairs
FE.definition:
<def-root>The State of affairs that is evaluated.
<ex>That was a <t>lucky</t> <fex name="State_of_affairs">catch</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Protagonist is the one for whom the destiny is evaluated.
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">He</fex> is <t>lucky</t>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>A description of the sort of <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>. This occurs with nominal LUs which are both the target and the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">My</fex> <fex name="Descriptor">good</fex> <fex name="State_of_affairs"><t>fortune</t></fex> has run out.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Role
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Role</fen> filled by the <fen>Protagonist</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">He</fex> is a <t>lucky</t> <fex name="Role">gambler</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time for which the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s destiny is good.
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">I</fex> was <fex name="deg">rather</fex> <t>fortunate</t> <fex name="Time">in the late 90s</fex>, making much of my fortune at that time.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is lucky (either a degree of goodness or a degree of unexpectedness, or both).
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">He</fex> is <fex name="deg">very</fex> <t>lucky</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location where the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has luck.
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">I</fex>'m only <t>lucky</t> <fex name="Place">in casinos</fex>.</ex></def-root>
